texts.fr: Matar est âgé de 38 ans, il est marié et père de 4 enfants dont un garçon et trois filles. Il loge dans un quartier situé à environ 5 km du guichet, dans la maison familiale. Il évolue dans le secteur du commerce de céréales, où il a acquis une expérience de plus de 9 ans. Il possède une charrette et fait  ses livraisons grâce à elle. Le crédit lui servira à l’achat de mil, maïs et de foin, qu’il va revendre. Une moitié est laissé à la maison pour la clientèle environnante, et l’autre, il charge sa charrette et fait l’ambulant. Il commence sa journée à 8h, jusqu’à 13h, il fait une pause pour reprendre à 16h jusqu’à 18h. Matar a pu réaliser quelques bénéfices qui lui ont permis d’améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille. Sur cette lancée, il compte et souhaite devenir un jour, autosuffisant et développer son activité.
texts.en:
Matar is 38 years old, married and father to four children, one boy and three girls.  He lives in his family home, in a neighbourhood which is around five kilometres from the field partner's office.  Matar works selling cereals and he has more than nine years' experience in his field.

Matar owns a cart which he uses to make deliveries.  His loan will be used to buy millet, maize and hay which he will resell.  Half of his stock is sold from his home to local customers and the other half is sold from his cart.  He begins work at eight in the morning, has a break from one to four in the afternoon, and then works again until six in the evening.

Through his work, Matar has been able to improve the standard of living of his family.  He would like to continue to do this and intends one day to become self-sufficient and build his business up.

loans.use: to buy cereals locally and hay, for resale.

loans.name: Abadahemuka Group

texts.fr:
Séraphine fait partie du groupe Abadahemana  et  habite à Gitega. Elle  a 45 ans et est mariée à Joseph, un charpentier. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants âgés de 6ans à 25 ans  dont 2 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de beignets depuis 10 ans. 

Elle est à son quatorzième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle  obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de farine pour préparer beaucoup de beignets  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les années prochaines, elle voudrait  voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Séraphine is a member of the Abadahemana Group, and lives in Gitega.  She is 45 years old and married to Joseph who is a carpenter. Together they have three children aged between 6 and 25 years.  Two of their children currently attend school.

Séraphine has been making fritters for ten years now. 

This will be her fourteenth loan with the field partner, Turame.  She plans to use the loan to increase her working capital and buy a large quantity of flour to prepare many fritters for sale.  In this way, she hopes to increase her earnings.

In the coming years, Séraphine would like to see her children study.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of flour to make fritters for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy hardware items for resale.

loans.name: Cerro Mojarra Group

texts.es:
En una comunidad  donde la mayor parte del territorio está ocupado por agua, los habitantes se dedican a la pesca y venta de mojarra, a la siembra y cosecha de caña y hule. 

En este lugar se formó un grupo llamado Cerro Mojarra debido a que la comunidad está rodeada por cerros y 2 de las integrantes se dedican a vender este tipo de pescado. 

Los integrantes del grupo y sus actividades son:

Margarita - Venta De Ropa
Ofelia - Servicio De Herrería
Agustin - Venta De Cerdos
Agustina – Venta De Pan 
Juana - Venta De Tacos Y Tortas
Laura - Venta De Mojarra
Maria Magdalen - Venta de Calzado Por Catálogo
Maria Del Refugio - Venta De Mojarra
Narciza - Venta De Abarrotes
Alejandrina -  Venta de Ensalada De Frutas

Doña  Agustina  es una mujer muy alegre, trabajadora, responsable y amable, es madre de 4 hijos todos ellos mayores de edad. Desde hace ya 30 años se ha dedicado a la preparación y venta de pan junto con su esposo. En un inicio, bastaba con hacer todo el proceso manualmente ya que la producción era conservadora. Con el paso del tiempo y al tener más clientes, la situación ha cambiado, Agustina ahora tiene un horno de piedra más grande y una batidora para poder mezclar una mayor cantidad de masa. Estas herramientas de trabajo las ha comprado gracias a los ahorros de sus ganancias y con los préstamos de VisionFund.

Doña Agustina y su esposo son fuente de empleo para otras personas en su comunidad, en la elaboración del pan los apoyan dos personas y para repartir el producto, siete más. Doña Agustina comenta que en temporada de frío la producción del pan aumenta y venden a la semana alrededor de 3000 piezas. Ya que esta temporada está cerca, Agustina necesita comprar más harina, azúcar, manteca, queso, colorante, papel estraza, canastos, charolas y pinzas para continuar con la actividad.

*La fotografía se tomó bajo la cocina de doña Refugio quien viste blusa blanca falda negra. Doña Agustina es quien está parada detrás de ella.
texts.en:
In a community where most of the land is covered by water the local people are in the fishing business and sell sea bream or grow and harvest cane and rubber.

This is where the communal bank "Cerro Mojarra" is located.  It is surrounded by hills (cerros) and two of the members sell sea bream (mojarra).

The members and their sales and services businesses are the following:

Margarita - Clothing 
Ofelia - Metalwork 
Agustin - Pigs
Agustina – Bread 
Juana - Taco and cake 
Laura - Sea bream 
Maria Magdalen - Shoes by catalogue
Maria Del Refugio - Seabream
Narciza - Groceries
Alejandrina -  Fruit salad

Agustina is a very cheerful, hard-working, responsible, kind woman.  She is the mother of four adult children.  For 30 years she has been baking and selling bread together with her husband.  At first she did all the process by hand because production was low.  But over time and with the increase of customers the situation has changed.  Agustina now has a larger stone oven and a blender to mix more dough.  She was able to buy these work tools thanks to savings she earned and loans from VisionFund.

Agustina and her husband are a source of employment for other people in their community.  Two other people help them make the bread and seven more help deliver.  Agustina says that in the cold season bread production increases and the weekly sales volume reaches 3,000 loaves.  The season is near and Agustina must buy flour, sugar, lard, cheese, coloring, brown paper, baskets, trays and tongs to continue her activity.

*The photograph was taken under Refugio's kitchen.  She is wearing a white blouse and black skirt.  Agustina is the one standing behind her.

loans.use: To buy flour, sugar, lard, cheese, food coloring,  brown paper, baskets, trays and tongs.

loans.name: Davlathocho

texts.ru: Давлатпочо молодая женщина из красивого района Дж.Руми. У нее трое детей. Давлатпочо занимается на рынке продажей детской одежды. В торговой деятельности она занята уже 2 года. Она любит свою работу и хочет дальше развиваться в данной сфере бизнеса. Давлатпочо хочет привезти теплую детскую одежды, но ей не хватает не большой суммы денег, чтобы заплатить за привозку и приобретения товара. Она решила обратиться за кредитом, потому что считает, что это единственный способ расширить бизнес.
texts.en: Davlathocho is a young woman from the beautiful district of J. Rumy. She has three children. Davlathocho sells children's clothing at a market. She has been involved in a retail business for 2 years. She loves her work and wants to continue growing in this business area. Davlathocho wants to bring in warm children's clothing, but is short a small amount of money to pay for the delivery and purchase of the merchandise. She decided to request a loan because she thinks that this is the only way to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy and deliver children's clothing

loans.name: Dúo Emprendedoras De Sacatepequez Group

texts.es: Dúo Emprendedoras de Sacatepequez La señora Emilia tiene una venta de ropa variada para dama, caballeros, niños desde hace 3 años, también ropa de bebe, trajecitos, frazadas, colchas, ropa interior variada.  También tiene una venta de verduras a un costado de su local de ropa y le va muy bien en sus ventas.  Su sueño es seguir creciendo y luchar fuertemente cada día  para estar preparada económicamente y materialmente para la llegada de su bebe que tanto anhela y que aun Dios no se lo ha regalo. Cuenta con el apoyo amoroso de su esposo persiguiendo sus metas cada día.  Tiene varios pedidos de pantalones en diferentes colores, tallas y marcas para damas y caballeros, también camisas, playeras, vestiditos de nenas y trajes de niños, pero el dinero que tiene no le alcanza, ella compra por docena para dar un buen precio y tener una buena ganancia, por tal motivo necesita un préstamo para no fallarles a sus clientes con los pedidos que le han hecho.
texts.en:
Emilia sells a variety of women's, men's and children's clothing and has been in business for three years.  She also sells baby clothes, suits, bedspreads, and underwear.   Next to her clothing stall she also sells vegetables and sales are doing very well.  Her dream is to continue expanding and working hard to be prepared economically and materially for the arrival of a baby that she is longing for but has not been blessed with yet.  

Emilia says she depends on the loving support of her husband on a daily basis to reach her goals.  She has received several orders for pants in different colors, sizes and brands for women and men.  Also for shirts, beachwear, little girl dresses and boys' suits.  But she does not have enough money to buy the merchandise in bulk to get a discount price and earn a good profit.  Therefore she needs a loan so as not to fail the customers who have placed orders.

loans.use: To buy new clothing to sell.

loans.name: Twizerimana Group

texts.fr:
Alice  fait partie du groupe  Twizerimana et  habite à  Gitega. C’est une veuve de  40 ans. Elle a 4 enfants  âgés de 10  à 22ans, tous étudient  étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de boutique (riz, haricot, maїs,…) depuis  27 ans. 

Elle  est son à dix-huitième  crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de maїs et de riz à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Alice is a member of the Twizerimana Group and lives in Gitega.  She is a 40-year-old widow with four children between the ages of 10 and 22 years.  All her children currently study.

Alice has been selling products such as rice, beans and maize for 27 years now.  This will be her eighteenth loan with the field partner, Turame.  She plans to use it to increase her working capital and buy a large quantity of maize and rice for resale.  In this way, Alice hopes to be able to increase her earnings.

In the coming years, Alice would like to see her children continue to study.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of maize and rice for resale.

loans.name: Jenny Cecilia

texts.es:
Cada día de trabajo para Jenny es un desafío ya que ha logrado además de culminar su carrera, estudiar una carrera técnica que le ha permitido encontrar buenas ofertas de trabajo y ha reforzado sus conocimientos adquiridos de la carrera que estudio que fue Administración de empresa, Jenny afirma sentirse realizada como profesional, porque ha logrado terminar sus estudios y ahora trabajar y de esa manera pagar sus estudios. Jenny a sus 32 años es casada pero no tiene hijos, se ha caracterizado por ser una joven responsable, comprometida con sus estudios, entusiasta y emprendedora.

Jenny labora como coordinadora de operaciones para una organización, sin embargo no ha logrado sacar su título por los altos costos del mismo, Jenny solicita el crédito para el pago de su titulación ya que así lograra culminar su curso y poder cumplir su metas futuras como obtener una maestría y sacar otro curso, deposita su confianza en el financiamiento del crédito que la beneficiara no solo en su perfil laboral, sino que desarrollara sus habilidades como profesional y de esa manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
For Jenny, every day of work is a challenge, because she has also managed to finish her career, studying a technical field that has allowed her to find good work offers and has reinforced her acquired knowledge from the study of business administration. 

Jenny feels fulfilled professionally because she has finished her studied and now works in this way to pay for tuition. Jenny is 32 years old and married but does not have children. She is a responsible young woman, committed to her studies, enthusiastic and entrepreneurial.

Jenny works as the operations coordinator for an organization. She has not been able to get her certification because of its high costs. Jenny seeks the loan to pay for the certification so she will be able to finish her studies and be able to complete her future goals, such as getting a master's and taking another course. 

She relies on credit financing which will not only benefit her job profile, but also develop her abilities as a professional so she can improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for her certification so she will achieve completion of her course.

loans.name: Dúo Guadalupe De San Pedro Group

texts.es: Dúo Guadalupe de san pedro La encargada de este grupo es la señora Guadalupe quien se dedica a la venta de cosméticos en general como cremas, desodorante, champo, perfumes, colonias, ropa de catalogo como playeras, camisas, blusas para dama, también a la venta de cortinas, sabanas, manteles desde hace 10 años y es vendedora ambulante. Su sueño es algún día tener un local propio para no caminar tanto y vender en un solo lugar, contando con el apoyo de su esposo y de sus hijos ya mayores de edad no descansara hasta alcanzarlo.  Las buenas ventas ya están presentándose y ella necesita surtir el negocio con mas artículos que le están pidiendo como las blusas de dama por docena valorada cada uno a Q, 200.00, tiene varios pedidos de  productos desechables como platos, vasos, cubiertos y no tiene lo suficiente en el negocio, por eso necesita hacer otro préstamo para no quedarle mal a sus clientes con todas las cosas que le han pedido.
texts.en:
The supervisor of this group is Guadalupe who sells cosmetics such as creams, deodorants, shampoo, perfume, cologne, clothing by catalogue: t-shirts, shirts, and women's blouses.  She also sells curtains, sheets and tablecloths and has been working as a street vendor for ten years.  Her dream is to have her own stall one day so she does not have to walk so much.  She has the support of her husband and adult children.

The season for increased sales is approaching and she must have on hand more of the items that are being requested such as women's blouses, which cost Q 200 a dozen.  She has several orders for disposable items such as plates, cups, and cutlery, and does not have enough money for the purchases.  Therefore she is need of another loan so she can fill the orders and not disappoint her customers.

loans.use: To buy new clothing to sell.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Dúo Buena Vista De San Martin Group

texts.es:
Dúo: Buena Vista de San Martin

Dúo formado por Ana Luisa es originaria del área de san Martín Jilotepeque. Ana Luisa se dedica desde hace más de cinco  años al engorde de animales  como lo son: Marranos y pollos, es una persona responsable y ha pagado puntualmente. Solicita el crédito para la compra de Animales y así obtener más ganancias. Agradece a Fape y Kiva el apoyo brindado ya que por medio de ese apoyo está cumpliendo sus metas de mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana Luisa is a member of the group and she is from the area of San Martín, Jilotepeque.  For over five years she has been raising pigs and chickens.  She is a responsible person who has been punctual in her payments.  The loan she is requesting is to buy animals and earn more money.  She is grateful to Fape and Kiva for the support because with this help she is able to meet her goals and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy animals to raise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the university installments for this semester.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy soups, eggs, basic grains, softdrinks, sweets, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Walter's Group

texts.en:
Featured in the picture above is Walter, who has been a farmer for more than 40 years. Although he is pictured alone, he is actually representing his group of 15 farmers in Teso District, Kenya. Walter has always been described as a very hardworking individual, which is largely why he was selected to be the group leader.

Walter started working with One Acre Fund for the first time in 2012, and this year he decided to not only get farming inputs but also a solar light as part of his loan. He is very excited about this new addition, as now he will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. He can’t wait to save more money for the future using the profits he earns from this coming season. 

Walter's Group will be able to plant a total of 11.25 acres using the farming inputs obtained with this loan, and will also receive a total of seven solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Ahed

texts.en:
Ahed, who appears in the photo, is a 19-year-old single man from Jabalia city. He lives with his family in a small, humble house. His father works as an employee in the public sector where he earns a low income. This is the only source of income for the family. Ahed studies information technology at the university, and is in his second year. He would like to complete his studies and find a job to help his family with part of their expenses.

Ahed has requested a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his studies. By taking this loan, Ahed will be able to do his homework and read articles online.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies

loans.name: Alexis Geovanny

texts.es:
Alexis de 33 años de edad, está acompañado y tiene una hija de 3 años de edad, estudió hasta 4° grado de educación básica, su pareja es ama de casa y solo ella y su hija viven con él y dependen totalmente de él.

Alexis es agricultor, aprendió desde pequeño trabajando con su padre en cultivos de maíz, frijol y maicillo, además tiene un trabajo de medio tiempo como fontanero en una empresa distribuidora de agua en el municipio donde vive. El terreno de siembra está en el mismo donde vive su única dificultad en llevar los insumos por lo que viaja cerca de 13 kilómetros en autobús solo de ida para ir a comprarlos.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprar adobes, cemento, hierro, arena y demás para reparar su casa, quiere aprovecha que pasó la época lluviosa. Entre las aspiraciones de Alexis esta dar a su familia todo lo que necesiten y poner un negocio en el que venda granos básicos que el mismo cosechó.
texts.en:
Alexis is 33 years old. He has a partner and a three-year-old daughter. Alexis has a fourth-grade education. His partner is a housewife. Alexis, his partner and their daughter live together; the family depends completely on Alexis.

Alexis is a farmer. He learned the trade from a young age by working with his father, who grew beans, corn and sorghum. Alexis also works part-time as a plumber for a local water distribution business. The land that Alexis works is very near his home. The only difficulty Alexis has is that he must travel almost 13 kilometres by bus in order to buy supplies.

This loan will be used to buy adobe blocks, cement, iron bars, sand and more in order for Alexis to repair his house. Alexis wants to take advantage of the fact that the rainy season has now ended.

Amongst others, Alexis’ aspirations are to give his family everything that they need and to start a business selling basic grains that he himself would grow.

loans.use: to buy adobe blocks, cement, iron bars, sand and more.

loans.name: Blanca Isabel

texts.es:
Blanca de 55 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos de 22, 18 y 16 años de edad de los que solo dos viven con ella, uno es agricultor y su hija es ama de casa. Ella estudio hasta 3° grado de educación básica, su esposo es agricultor solo él y sus hijos viven con ella.

Blanca es comerciante, tiene un negocio en el que vende lácteos (leche y queso) tiene 18 años de experiencia, aprendió por iniciativa propia al no encontrar otra manera de ayudar a su familia; es su única actividad económica, distribuye su producto en los municipios cercanos y trabaja aproximadamente 5 horas al día.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprar una vaca lechera, con el aumento de la producción de leche se verá beneficiada con una mayor cantidad de producto para vender que le dará mejores ganancias en su negocio. Blanca espera más adelante establecer un puesto fijo de venta, para no andar de casa en casa ya que con la edad se le está dificultando más cubrir su zona de venta.
texts.en:
Blanca is 55 years old, married and has three children, ages 22, 18 and 16 years old. Only two of Blanca’s children still live at home. One is a farmer while Blanca’s daughter looks after the home. Blanca has a third grade education. Her husband is a farmer. Only Blanca and her husband and two of her children live in the family home.

Blanca is a businesswoman. She has a business selling dairy products (milk and cheese) and has 18 years’ experience in the business. Blanca learned this trade by herself as she had no other way of helping her family. This is Blanca’s only work. She sells her products in nearby municipalities and works around five hours per day.

This loan will be used to buy a dairy cow. With an increase in milk production, Blanca will have more to sell, giving her higher profits in her business. In the future, Blanca hopes to have a fixed stall for making sales in order not to walk door-to-door – at her age, the task of covering her local area is becoming difficult.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, breeze blocks, sheets, iron, sand, etc.

loans.name: Mungu Bariki Group

texts.fr: Enseignant de carrière, Eliakimu a deposé une mise en disponibilité à son service afin de concentrer tout son temps à cultiver leurs quatre champs avec son épouse. Président du groupe MUNGU BARIKI, il apprécie l'activité champêtre car elle le rend indépendant dans la recherche de la nourriture, frais scolaires et soins médicaux pour les membres de sa famille. Toutefois, cette activité est butée aux difficultés de labour manuel et dont la main d'oeuvre coûte chère, l'entretien de sentiers et l'entreposage lors de la récolte. Ce crédit lui permettra d'assurer les travaux de sarclage, d'achat des insecticides et engrais ainsi que le labour d'un autre champ. Il souhaiterait dans l'avenir d'étendre ses activités agricoles aux cultures maraichères (arachides, mais,...), assurer la scolarité de ses sept enfants, concrétiser son projet d'installation d'un moulin à manioc afin de diversifier ses revenus. De gauche à droite, Eliakimu est le quatrième, habillé en chemise noire et touche les herbes.
texts.en:
A career teacher, Eliakimu asked to be excused from his post so as to concentrate all his time on farming their four fields, together with his wife. As the president of the group called MUNGU BARIKI, he thinks highly of farming since it makes him independent in his quest for livelihood: food, school fees, and medical expenses for the members of his family. 

However, this activity runs afoul of the difficulty with manual labor; laborers are very expensive, paths [between the fields] have to be kept up, and [there is] warehousing at harvest time. 

This loan will allow him to cover weeding and buying insecticides and fertilizer, as well as plowing another field. In future he would like to expand his agricultural activities to include market gardening (peanuts, maize, etc.), be certain of paying school fees for his seven children, and carry out his plan to install a mill to grind manioc so as to diversify his income sources. 

From left to right, Eliakimu is the fourth, wearing a black shirt and holding some plants.

loans.use: to pay for weeding, buy fertilizer and insecticides, and plow another field.

loans.name: Mirzo

texts.ru:
Мирзо мужчина в возрасте 40 лет , женат ,отец пятерых детей. Он с раннего возраста работал на поле , помогал отцу строить дом , смотреть за домашним скотом . После женитьбы Мирзо продолжил заниматься разведением скота ,так как у его родителей не было средств обучить в университете. Сейчас у него есть 15 гектаров земли,где он и занимается животноводством. Кроме этого , он также на своем участке земли выращивает овощи и фрукты. Полученный урожай Мирзо и его сын продают на рынке . Товар хорошо скупается. 
В настоящее время Мирзо планирует закупить корм для скота , но не имеет нужной суммы . Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Он надеется,что МДО Арванд откликнется на его просьбу и выделит нужную сумму для расширения бизнеса . Заранее благодарит за доверие и содействие .
texts.en:
Mirzo is 40 years old,  married, and the father of five children.  In his youth, he was already working the land, helping his father build their house and taking care of the livestock.  After his marriage, Mirzo continued to breed cattle because his parents had no money to send him to university.  Today, Mirzo owns 15 hectares of land and he is involved in animal husbandry.  Additionally he grows fruits and vegetables.  After the harvest, Mirzo and his son sell their crops at the market, where they are in high demand. 

Mirzo is now planning to buy feed for his cattle, but he doesn't have enough money.  For this reason, he has turned to MDO Arvand for financial support.  He hopes that MDO Arvand will grant him this request and lend him the sum that he needs to expand his business.  He thanks you in advance for your trust and cooperation.

loans.use: to buy feed for his livestock.

loans.name: Melda's Group

texts.en:
Melda, pictured above, has been a farmer for 12 years, and is now proud to represent her group of 16 farmers in Teso District. She is 40 years old, is married and has five children.

Melda likes to think of herself as a very hardworking individual. She has been working with One Acre Fund since 2012 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to spread the story of One Acre Fund farmers. She says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that she has had more profits from each harvest. Melda plans to use the profits from this coming season to save more money for the future.

In total, Melda’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 8.75 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light with this loan, the group will also receive a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Abdu

texts.ru:
Абду мужчина 45 лет , женат , отец четверых детей.Он занимается животноводством.На своем участке земли Абду разводит коров и баранов.Ухаживать за домашним скотом ему помогает его жена . Молоко ,полученное от коров , его младшая дочь продаёт на рынке . Его жена занимается шитьём . Иногда ей приходится сидеть допоздна,чтобы докончить заказ . Абду трудится день и ночь ,чтобы обеспечить своим детям светлое будущее,чтобы им не пришлось работать в поте лица на поле в жару и холод, чтобы хотя как -нибудь прокормить семью .
Абду в скором времени хочет женить своего старшего сына. Но перед свадьбой ему необходимо приобрести нужные вещи.Он хочет купить мебель ,но не имеет полной суммы.Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой.Абду надеется,что МДО Арванд откликнется на его просьбу и выделит нужную сумму . Он выражает свою благодарность МДО Арванд за то,что в трудные моменты МДО Арванд всегда протягивает руку помощи людям,которые нуждаются в поддержке.
texts.en:
Abdu is 45 years old, married, and the father of four children.  He works in animal husbandry, raising cows and sheep on his own land.  His wife helps him to take care of the livestock, and their youngest daughter sells the milk they get from the cows, at the market.  Abdu's wife works as a seamstress and she sometimes has to work very late to finish an order.  Abdu also works very hard, day and night, to feed his family and to provide a brighter future to his children, so that they won't have to do like him, work the land tirelessly in the heat and cold.  

Abdu is planning to marry his oldest son very soon, but before the wedding, he needs to purchase a few things.  For this reason, he has turned to MDO Arvand for financial assistance.  He is hoping that MDO Arvand will grant him this request and lend him the money that he needs.  He is very thankful  for the support provided by this organization as they are always there, in difficult times, to lend a hand to people who need some support.

loans.use: to buy furniture.

loans.name: Magdalena Albina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSA DE LIMATAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Limatambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Magdalena Albina  se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de verduras, la socia lleva a diferentes lugares, la socia vende  cebollas, tomates y zapallos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las verduras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar  verduras como cebollas, zanahorias y tomates. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Magdalena Albina is a member of the "SANTA ROSA DE LIMATAMBO" communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Limatambo, in Anta province in the department of Cusco. Magdalena Albina makes a living from selling vegetables in various places. She sells onions, tomatoes and pumpkins. She has been running this business for a number of years and it is going very well. Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell her vegetables. She is requesting the loan to purchase vegetables such as onions, carrots and tomatoes. She is happy about the loan and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables such as onions, carrots and tomatoes.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSA DE LIMATAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Limatambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Maria se dedica al negocio de venta de comida,ella tiene un restaurant, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the "SANTA ROSA DE LIMATAMBO" communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Limatambo, in Anta province in the department of Cusco. 

Maria makes a living selling food at her restaurant. She makes dishes such as roast chicken, soups and meat stirfries. She works from 8:00am until 6:00pm. She has been running her business for 8 years and it is going very well. Her dream is to have a restaurant. She is requesting the loan to buy products for cooking such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

She is happy with the loan and is committed to making the payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase products for cooking such as rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Inti Pakareq Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “INTI PAKAREQ”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             
La socia es la Sra. Ruth Julieta, la socia continua con su negocio de venta de tejidos y textiles, la socia continua  fabricando tejidos como chompas y chalinas y también textiles en base a hilos y lanas, la socia lleva años dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar hilos, tijeras, lanas entre otros.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de alfombras, negocio de venta de cortinas, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de artesanías.
 La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
These members are all part of the "SANTA ROSA DE LIMATAMBO" communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Limatambo, in Anta province in the department of Cusco.

The featured member is Ruth Julieta. She runs a business selling woven products and textiles. She makes woven articles such as jumpers and scarves and also cotton and woollen textiles. She has made a living from this business for years and it is going well thanks to the effort she puts in to her business each day. This member would like to continue working so that she will be able to keep supporting her family. 

She is requesting a loan to buy cotton, scissors and wool, among other things. 

The other members engage in business activities such as selling rugs, selling curtains, managing a grocery store, and selling handicrafts. 

The member would like to thank those who form part of this dream through lending and she is committed to make her payments on time. 

The members who appear in the attached thumbnail photos apologised for arriving late to the meeting for work-related reasons.

loans.use: to purchase cotton, scissors, and wool, among other things.

loans.name: Mary Raquel

texts.es: Doña Mary es originaria del área de san Martin Jilotepeque y desde hace más de seis años se ha dedicado junto a su esposo e hijos a la crianza de ganado vacuno y pollos. Estos productos tienen buena demanda en el mercado. Mary Raquel contenta porque por medio de este trabajo está ayudando a su esposo, ya que el sueño de ambos es que sus 4 hijos estudien y lleguen a tener una profesión.  Y junto a su esposo están muy felices porque su hijo mayor se va a graduar en este mes y así verán el esfuerzo de tanta inversión. Solicitan el crédito para la compra de marranos para engorde y concentrado.Les agradecen por su ayuda ya que gracias a los creditos otorgados por ustedes ella a podido salir adelante.
texts.en: Mary is originally from the area of San Martin Jilotepeque and she has made a living for more than six years raising cattle and poultry with her husband and children. There is a high demand for these products in the market. Mary Raquel is happy because through this work she is helping her husband, and their dream is for their 4 children to study and gain a profession. She and her husband are very happy because their oldest son will graduate this month and so they will see their efforts paying off after such an investment. They are requesting the loan to buy pigs to fatten and concentrated feed. They would like to thank you for your support because through the loans granted she has managed to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
El socio sigue dedicándose con su negocio de venta de repuestos de automoviles, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, el socio continua vendiendo faros, parabrisas entre otros a todos sus clientes que le socitan,siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita le crédito para comprar parabrisas entre otros.
El socio está feliz con el crédito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Antonio continues to make a living selling automobile spare parts. He is a responsible and determined person. He continues to sell items including headlights and windscreens to meet all of his customers' requests and in this way he can assist his family to get ahead. He is requesting the loan to buy windscreens and other items. He is happy about the loan and he pledges to make all of his repayments.

loans.use: to purchase windscreens and other items

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSA DE LIMATAMBO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Limatambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Florencia se dedica al negocio de agricultura, la socia tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra café y plátanos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de agricultura. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Florencia belongs to the communal group "Santa Rosa de Limatambo", located in Limatambo district, belonging to Anta province and the department of Cusco.  Florencia earns a living in agriculture and has a piece of land where she plannts coffee and bananas.  

Florencia works from 8AM until 6PM.  She has worked at this business for several years now and it's going very well.  Her dream is to increase her business in farming.  She is asking for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers, is happy about the loan and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Rosa Elena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TODOS UNIDOS, la socia sigue dedicándose a su negocio de venta de auto partes de automóviles, la socia continua vendiendo los repuestos en un local a todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoya do a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra parabrisas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Rosa Elena belongs to the communal gorup  "All of us united".  She wants to keep working at her business selling auto parts.  She sells the parts at a store to  all the customers who come looking for something.  Rosa Elena wants to keep working in this way in order to continue giving her family financial support.

Rosa Elena is asking for a loan to buy windshields among other items.    She feels grateful for the granting of a loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy windshields and other items

loans.name: Rigo Jose

texts.es:
En tierras lejanas y montañosas del norte del país, con un clima incomparable sale todas las mañanas a ejercer sus actividades agrícolas Rigo. A su temprana edad de 22 años y con una pequeña hija, sale Junto su compañera  a trabajar en el campo la  cosecha de frijol que heredo desde los 12 años por su padre. Su rutina empieza desde la cosecha hasta el traslado del producto a las cercanías del centro de la ciudad para distribuir el frijol y alcanzar un mejor precio de venta. Esto es parte de la práctica de cada uno de los sembradores de frijol en este lugar, por lo tanto el precio del producto tiene mucha demanda y gran competencia.
La consistencia y el empeño que pone Rigo en su negocio han logrado tener mucho éxito a pesar de la competencia.  Para alcanzar mayor productividad solicita el crédito para comprar insumos y pagar la mano de obra en la cosecha de una manzana más de frijol. Con este plan espera cancelar este préstamo y desarrollarse como un agricultor que apoye al desarrollo de su familia y el país.
texts.en:
On distant and mountainous land in the northern part of the country with an unequaled climate, Rigo goes out every morning to do his agricultural activities. At his young age of 22 and with a young daughter, he goes out with his wife to work the bean field he inherited 12 years ago from his father. His routine starts with the harvest to the transport of the product to the nearby town center to distribute the beans and attain a better price. This is part of the practices of each of the bean growers in the area. Therefore the price of the product has a lot of demand and a lot of competition. 

The consistency and hard work that Rigo puts into his business have led to him having a lot of success, despite the competition. To attain better productivity he is asking for the loan to buy materials and to pay for the labor to harvest another manzana (about 1/2 and acre) of beans. With this plan, he hopes to pay off this loan and develop as a farmer who supports his family and his country.

loans.use: to buy materials and pay for labor to harvest another manzana (about 1/2 acre) of beans.

loans.name: Rene Wildon

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal TODOS UNIDOS, él socio continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de auto partes y adornos de autos, el socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, él socio continua vendiendo faros, parabrisas entre otros a todos sus clientes que le solicitan, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de faros entre otros.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the TODOS UNIDOS communal bank. He continues to work in the business of selling auto parts and accessories. He is grateful for the loan that was given and he is committed to making the payments according to schedule. He continues to sell headlights, windshields, and more to his customers who need them. He wants to be able to keep working so that he can continue to support his family.  

He is asking for the loan to buy headlights, among other things.

loans.use: to buy headlights, among other things.

loans.name: Lizbeth

texts.es:
La socia Lizbeth pertenece al banco comunal “Todos Unidos”, la socia continua dedicándose al negocio  de venta de auto partes, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le, pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de faros, entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Lizbeth belongs to the “Todos Unidos” communal bank. She continues to work in the business of selling auto parts. She has had her business for a long time and it is going well for her thanks to the hard work she puts into her business everyday. She wants to be able to keep working so that she can keep supporting her family. 

She is asking for the loan to buy headlights, among other things. She is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy headlights, among other things.

loans.name: Jermine Narcisa

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Unión Y Fortaleza se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio La Dolorosa en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Jermine, tiene 31 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 16 y 10 años,  el mayor estudia en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una fábrica local.
Doña Jermine es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto  ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, zapatos, perfumes, bisuterías, carteras, entre otras cosas, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta,  trabaja tres días a la semana realizando sus recorridos y también vende en su casa lugar hasta donde llegan sus clientes si necesitan algún producto de los que ella vende, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene 3 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual se gana algo por el bien de su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, perfumes y zapatos. Lleva más de 8 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le han ayudado a aumentar su negocio. Sus sueños son tener un carro para ir a vender sus productos.
texts.en:
The loan group Union y Fortaleza (Unity and Strength) meets every fortnight in the suburb of La Dolorosa in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches which attract many visitors in every season and a city of unmatched beauty with many tourist attractions. 

Living in this city is Jermine, who is 31 years of age, married, and from this relationship she has two children who are 16 and 10 years old. The older one studies at high school and the younger at primary school. Her husband works at a local factory. 

Jermine is a housewife who, in order to earn her own income and with this be able to help her husband with the household expenses, runs a business selling clothing of all kinds, shoes, perfumes, jewellery, handbags and other items. Her sales method is door-to-door and she works three days a week out of the house as well as selling from home, where her customers can come if they need an item that she sells. She sells her items on credit and collects payment every 8 days.

She has been engaged in this business activity for 3 years and through it she earns income to support her family. This loan is to purchase clothing, perfumes and shoes. She has been in the Loan Group for more than 8 years and she likes it because the loans have helped her to develop her business. Her dream is to own a car to be able to travel and sell her products.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, perfumes and shoes.

loans.name: Alberta

texts.en:
Alberta is a married woman and the mother of three children from Iloilo, Philippines. 

She owns a sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her area. Alberta also earns additional income through her hog raising business.
 
She is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like noodles, sodas and beverages, soap and toiletries, canned goods, rice, biscuits and bread. She also wants additional piglets to raise. Through this, she will be able to improve her business as well as her income.

In the future, Alberta hopes to expand her business and make it a success. Moreover, she wants to save money for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like noodles, sodas and beverages, soap and toiletries, canned goods, rice, biscuits and bread. Also additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Beatrice's Group

texts.en:
Beatrice's Group is formed by 11 farmers in the Teso District and is being represented by Beatrice, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 41 years old, married and has 3 children. Beatrice has been a farmer for 20 years and is often referred to as a very trustworthy person.

Beatrice isn’t new to One Acre Fund. She actually joined the program in 2012 and has since noticed that her life has changed; especially in the sense that she has learnt a lot from farming training over the period. This year, Beatrice will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition since now she will be able to reduce their consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Using this loan, Beatrice's Group will purchase a total of 11 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 6.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a 30-year-old woman who is married to Peter. They are blessed with two children and Jane contributes additional income to support their family.  

Jane has been operating a firewood selling business for a period of three years, earning herself an income of KES 15,000 at the end of every month.

She is now servicing her fifth loan of KES 50,000 and intends to use this amount to buy additional firewood to sell to her customers on a daily basis.

She plans to use the anticipated income to pay school fees for her children, and she hopes to become a successful business woman with a bright future.

loans.use: to buy additional firewood to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is thankful that she was granted a Php 10,000 loan which she used to buy chicken, pork, and seasonings for her food business. Through her earnings she is able to support her family and meet their daily basic needs.

She would like now to apply for Php 20,000, which she will use to buy dozens of chicken and more kilos of pork to cook in preparation for Christmas orders. She is thanking God and you in advance for a good return on her investment and the financial help that will be given her.

Arlene dreams that all her hard work will bear fruit to give her family a bright future and be able to send her children to the best schools.  She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

 * All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To purchase pork and chicken

loans.name: Ruth's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Ruth, often described as an extremely experienced farmer. She is 43 years old and, as a group leader, she is representing her group of seven farmers in Teso Distric, Kenya.  She is married and has two children.

Ruth is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again as this means that she is able to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, which is why she decided to join in the first place. Ruth says that she is happy to have made that decision because, since she first joined in 2012, she has learned a lot from farming training, which has improved her day-to-day life significantly. 

Ruth will use the profits from this season to send her children to school.

The group will use this loan to purchase a total of one solar light, as well as seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 4.5 acres. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of one solar light.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Artak

texts.en:
Artak lives with his lovely mother in Kapan city of Syunik region. He is 30 years old and he is not married yet. He has a higher education; he graduated from Agricultural State Institute in Yerevan. 

Being greatly thankful for his first Kiva deal, Artak hopes for the second one. For many years he worked as a contractual military serviceman. Now with the help of his mother, he is engaged in a fruit and vegetable trading business. In his own car he drives along his city and sells a great variety of fruits (apples, grapes, lemons, pears, nuts, etc.) and vegetables (potatoes, beans, greens, cabbages, radishes, etc.). All the products Artak buys from the villages of his region, and with all these products he manages to gain customers, thanks to not very expansive prices. 

Artak asks for this loan amount in order to buy and store a lot of fruit and vegetables to sell.

loans.use: to buy and store a lot of fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Betty's Group

texts.en:
Betty's Group is formed by 16 farmers in Teso District and is being represented by Betty, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 38 years old, is married, and has three children. Betty has been a farmer for more than 20 years, and is often referred to as a very hardworking individual.

Betty isn’t new to One Acre Fund, she actually joined the program in 2012 and has since noticed her life has changed; especially in the sense that she has had more profits from each harvest ever since. This year, Betty will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition since now she will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Using this loan, Betty's Group will purchase a total of five solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 8.75 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Raphael's Group

texts.en:
Raphael is a 42-year-old Komaza tree farmer. He has nine children, all of whom are in school. Raphael is married, and his spouse is a farmer, too. 

In addition to growing trees, Raphael also supports his family with dairy farming. He decided to join Komaza to improve the environment and increase his income. He plans to spend the money earned from the Komaza tree farm to to continue educating his children, start a business, and build a better house for his family. 

Raphael’s favorite part about working with Komaza is the taking care of his trees. Raphael is the farmer with his hand raised in the picture.

loans.use: to purchase tree farm planting inputs such as seedlings, and pay for technical training and planting support

loans.name: Annet's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Annet, often described as an extremely resourceful person. She is 30 years old and, as a group leader, she is representing her group of 13 farmers in Teso Distric, Kenya.  She is married and has one child.

Annet is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again as this means that she is able to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, which is why she decided to join in the first place. Annet says that she is happy to have made that decision because, since she first joined in 2012, she has learned a lot from farming training, which has improved her day-to-day life significantly. 

Annet will use the profits from this season to invest in a business.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 7.25 acres. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light with this loan, the group will also receive a total of four solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Afërdita

texts.en:
Aferdita is 20 years old and already has two children. For more than two years now, she has been running her own business from her home, making clothing for weddings, and traditional wedding and celebration clothing. She is very well known in the area for her professionalism and quality work. Her business has continued to grow each year, and she is very satisfied with her work and the income that she generates from it. 

Now she is requesting a loan in order to purchase material for her work. The loan will help her to be able to meet the needs of her customers and provide them with more variety and quality products. 

Her goal is to be able to expand her business and eventually have her own shop. She appreciates all of the lenders support.

loans.use: To purchase material for her business, making wedding clothing

loans.name: Demiano

texts.en:
Demiano lives with his wife and children in a rural area. He has two dependents under his responsibility. He mostly grows coffee and bananas. He lives in a rural community with no electricity and water service. His community basically works in agriculture, livestock raising, and commerce.

Demiano does agriculture. He has agricultural land, where he has coffee plantings of the Catimor variety, which are in good condition. He has quite a bit of experience in this work. In addition, Demiano has a good social background in the society.

The purpose of the loan is to purchase compost to maintain his coffee plantation. By investing in his business, he will be able to acquire acceptable income so that he can improve the quality of his household.

loans.use: To buy compost manure

loans.name: Saul Orlando

texts.es:
Saúl, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas con los que cultivara maíz, así prepara el terreno y obtendrá una mejor cosecha.
El financiamiento anterior le fue de ayuda para que hoy en día tenga un negocio más productivo, nuevos clientes, mejores ingresos y un nivel de vida más favorable.
texts.en: Saúl has decided to take another loan to buy agricultural inputs with which to grow corn. In this way he will prepare the land and get a better harvest. The previous loan was useful as today he has a more productive business, new clients, better income and a more favorable living standard.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs to grow corn.

loans.name: Dúo Fuente De Agua Viva Ll Group

texts.es: Dúo fuente de Agua viva. Este grupo esta conformado por la señora Vilma Raquel de 32 años de edad, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la elaboracion y venta de tejidos tipicos, esta muy agradecida con Kiva ya que los credito que ha obtenido en kiva le a ayudado mucho en su negocio, en esta oportunidad esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboracion y venta de tejidos tipicos
texts.en: One of the members of the "Dúo fuente de Agua Viva Ll" group is Vilma Raquel who is 32 years old. For the past several years she has been working making and selling traditional weaving. She is very pleased with Kiva as the loans she has received from Kiva have helped her a lot in her business. At this time she is requesting this loan to buy raw materials to make and sell traditional weaving.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make and sell traditional weaving.

loans.name: Dúo Flor De Trigo Group

texts.es:
DUO FLOR DE TRIGO
Doña Hercilia es originaria del municipio de  Tecpan, Guatemala tiene 52 años de edad bajo su responsabilidad están sus 6 hijos menores de edad  ella cuenta con una  tienda de venta de artículos de  consumo diario.
El esposo de ella trabaja como carpintero y gracias al apoyo de el y de toda su familia  ella sigue adelante con su negocio, ya que se están ayudando para poder salir adelante con su familia.
Ella sueña con  ampliar mas su negocio surtirlo con mas variedad productos para obtener mejores ganancias y asi poder mandar sus hijos a la escuela, para un futuro mejor ya que hoy en dia la educación es muy importante en los jóvenes.
texts.en:
Hercilia is from Tecpan, Guatemala. She is 52 years old and she is responsible for her 6 young children. She has a store that sells items for daily consumption.

Her husband works as a carpenter and thanks to his support and the support of all her family, she is able to continue with her business. The family is helping each other to get ahead. 

Hercilia dreams of expanding her business and stocking it with a larger variety of products so that she can earn more money. That way she will be able to send her children to school so that they can have a better future since education is so important for young people today.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell

loans.name: Kory Ampara - 27 Group

texts.es:
Alivia es una mujer de 37 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene dos hijos varones de 10 y 14 años, y una hija de 20 años, y su negocio es la venta de condimentos y especias.
Ella es emprendedora, responsable, independiente, constante y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en diferentes ferias y mercados de la ciudad, lugar caracterizado por el clima frio y seco con una temperatura entre 0-21 grados centígrados que varía durante el día.
Alivia es de tez morena, baja estura, cabello negro largo trenzado, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es el aymará y habla español para el comercio (de pie a la derecha, suéter rojo). Su vida la realiza junto a sus hijos, todos estudian y trabajan en el negocio familiar. Su anhelo de superación la hizo formar una banca de emprendimiento con personas y negocios como; venta de vajillas, venta de celulares, venta de carne de pollo, venta de flores, servicio de té, taller de costura y elaboración de empanadas, para solicitar un préstamo y ampliar sus negocios. Su negocio es la Venta de especias, condimentos y más, fabricados de una materia prima de primera calidad, como; Ablandador de carnes, Ajo Molido, Ajonjolí, Bicarbonato, Canela entera, Canela Molida, Clavo Entero, Comino Molido, Hierbas y especias finas, Nuez, Nuez Caramelizada, Orégano, Pimienta Blanca Molida, Pimienta Negra Molida, Pimienta Negra Entera, Sal con ajo, Sal con cebolla, Sal con pimienta, Uva Pasa, etc. ‘comenzamos hace cinco años junto a mi pareja, ahora compro por mayor y vendo al retaceo…’comenta. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio y tener una tienda, y desea realizar la compra de hierbas y especias por mayor para complacer a sus clientes con variedad de sabores. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en cinco años que lleva en esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Alivia solicita un préstamo para la compra de hierbas y especias por mayor para surtir su negocio y complacer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Alivia, age 37, lives with her life partner.  She has two sons, ages 14 and 20, and a 20 year old daughter.  Her business is selling condiments and spices.  She is enterprising, responsible, independent, persistent, and hard-working.  She conducts her business at different fairs and markets in the city.  The place is known for its cold and dry climate, which varies between 0 and 21 degrees centigrade during the day.

Alivia has a dark complexion, is short, has long braided black hair, and dresses traditionally (hat, shawl, and skirt).  Her mother tongue is Aymará, and she speaks Spanish for the business.  She is standing to the right, and she has on a red sweater.

She lives her life together with her children.  They all go to school and work in the family business.  Her desire to improve herself made her form a communal bank with people and businesses like selling crockery, selling cell phones, selling chicken, selling flowers, a tea service, a seamstress shop, and making empanadas.  The communal bank was formed in order to request a loan and expand their businesses.

Her business is selling spices, condiments, and more that is made from first quality raw materials.  She sells things like meat tenderizer, ground garlic, sesame, baking soda, whole cinnamon, ground cinnamon, whole cloves, ground cumin, herbs, fine spices, nuts, caramelized nuts, oregano, ground white pepper, ground black pepper, black peppercorns, garlic salt, onion salt, pepper salt, and raisins, etc.  “Together with my life partner, I started five years ago.  I now buy in bulk and sell in smaller portions,” she says.

Her dream is to expand her business and to have a store.  She wishes to purchase herbs and spices wholesale in order to please her customers with a variety of flavors.  This is her first loan cycle with the institution.  She has been engaged in this business activity for five years.  It is for these reasons that Alivia is requesting a loan to buy herbs and spices wholesale.  She will do this to stock her business and to please her customers.

loans.use: to buy herbs and spices wholesale.

loans.name: Mercedes Yolanda

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Unión Y Fortaleza se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio La Dolorosa en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Mercedes, tiene 60 años de edad, está separada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos mayores de edad, todos  viven aun en su casa.
Doña Mercedes es una muy buena madre que para cubrir los gastos del hogar se vio en la necesidad de buscar sus propios ingresos, ella  se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su casa en la cual también vende ciertas bebidas como aguas, colas, jugos, etc. Trabaja todos los días, ella deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada semana. Tiene más de 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le ayuda a salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas, colas y aguas. Está desde el inicio en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños es tener un gran local.
texts.en:
The "Unión Y Fortaleza" communal bank meets every fortnight in the La Dolorosa neighborhood of the city of Manta, a city known for it's beautiful beaches that has lots of visitors all year long. It is a city of great beauty second to none with many tourist attractions.

Mercedes lives here. She is 60 years old, separated and from this relationship has 3 grown children who all live in her house. Mercedes is a good mother who in order to pay the household expenses had to look for her own income.

She works selling clothing of all kinds. Her method of selling is door-to-door and she also sells from her house where she also sells some drinks like water, cola, juices, etc. She works every day, leaving clothing on credit and collects every week. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years in order to get ahead.

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise like pants, blouses, t-shirts, cola and water. She has been a member of the communal bank since it's initiation and she likes it as she started her business with the loans. Her dream is to have a big store.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts, colas and water.

loans.name: Aida Marina

texts.es:
Aida Marina vive en Valle Hermoso, parroquia de la ciudad de Santo Domingo, un valle muy productivo con clima cálido húmedo, además este pueblo es conocido por el turismo.
Aida Marina vive con su esposo quien trabaja de guardia en una empresa cerca al sector. Aida se dedica a la crianza de chanchos, tiene las chancheras bien cuidadas, gracias a este negocio Aida le ha podido dar la educación a sus hijos y sacar adelante a su familia. Con la ayuda de su esposo también han podido adquirir un terreno donde cuentan con su humilde casa. Aida necesita incrementar sus chanceras, construir y comprar más chanchitos, para ello acudió a Fundación Alternativa, clienta fiel a la institución, ha trabajado anteriormente con créditos Kiva, está muy agradecida con la ayudada brindada durante estos años. Con esta inversión está segura que sus ingresos mejoraran y podrá seguir creciendo como microempresaria.
texts.en:
Aida Marina lives in Valle Hermosa, a parish in the town of Santo Domingo. It is a productive valley with a warm, humid climate; it is also well known for tourism.

Aida Marina lives with her husband who works as a guard in a company located nearby. She earns her living raising pigs and has several well-run pig styes. Thanks to this business Aida has been able to provide her children with an education and help her family get ahead. With help from her husband she has also been able to acquire land where they have built their simple home. 

Aida now needs to build more pig styes and buy more piglets so she has approached Fundación Alternativa where she is a faithful client. She has had previous loans with Kiva. She is very grateful for the help she has received over the years. With this investment she is sure that her income will increase and she will be able to continue growing as a small businesswoman.

loans.use: buy more pigs for her small business

loans.name: Margret's Group

texts.en:
Margaret is 54 years old and has 5 children. She is a group leader and is representing her group formed by 16 farmers in Teso District, Kenya. 

Margaret has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds, and, although she described her last harvest as excellent, she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Margaret also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study.

Obtaining this loan means that Margaret's Group will be able to receive a total of 5 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 10.75 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Phylis's Group

texts.en:
Phylis's Group is formed by 15 farmers in Teso District. The group members are being represented by Phylis, who is the group leader, pictured above. She is 28 years old and has been a farmer for five years, and she is often described as a very resourceful person.

Phylis isn’t new to One Acre Fund. She actually joined the program in 2014. Since then, she has noticed that her life has changed, especially in the sense that she has had more profits from each harvest. This year, Phylis will get not only fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but she also will purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition, because now she will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel, thereby saving more money.

Using this loan, Phylis's Group will purchase a total of 13 solar lights and farming inputs enough to plant a total of 6.75 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, and cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Merab's Group

texts.en:
Merab is 32 years old and has 5 children. She has been a farmer for 14 years and is always said to be a very hardworking individual. Even though Merab is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group formed by 10 farmers in Teso District, Kenya.

Merab started working alongside One Acre Fund a few years ago, in 2011, and decided to do so because she wanted to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds. Since then, she has seen her life improve; especially in the sense that she has had more profits from each harvest ever since. This year she decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers.

Merab’s Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 5.25 acres of land. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 4 solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season

loans.name: Gonzalo

texts.es: Todas las mañanas Don Gonzalo se levanta para distribuir toda la mercadería que les ofrece a sus clientes en la ciudad de Boaco. Tiene 59 años de edad está casado y tiene una hija a cargo, es de oficio comerciante y hace 11 años se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños y adultos, su esposa siempre lo ha apoyado. Solicita el crédito para comprar ropa, tela y sandalias. El crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá surtir la demanda de sus clientes en esta temporada navideña. Dentro de sus planes futuros está establecer su propio tramo para ofrecer mayor cantidad y variedad siempre con el apoyo de KIVA-MiCrédito.
texts.en:
Every morning, Gonzalo wakes up and distributes all of the merchandise that he offers to his customers in the city of Boaco. He is 59 years old, is married, and has one daughter in his care. He is a merchant and, 11 years ago, he began to sell clothing for children and adults. His wife has always supported him.

He requests this loan to purchase clothing, fabric, and sandals. The loan will help him greatly because he will be able to meet his customers' demand during this holiday season. 

His future plans include establishing his own shop location in order to offer a greater quantity and variety with the support of Kiva and MiCredito.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, fabric, and sandals.

loans.name: Mujeres Triunfadoras De Micaela Bastidas Group

texts.es: Reyna   de 51 años de edad conviviente  y madre de  1 hijo, Reyna  tiene un pequeño negocio de ventas de ropa para damas y caballeros,  ya hace unos 24 años. Reyna también confecciona ropa,  ha llegado a fidelizar  a sus clientes  el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de su hogar, Reyna sigue adelante día a día con la ayuda de su familia esforzándose mucho y poder lograr todos sus objetivos,  Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en comprar más productos (telas, hilos etc.) para su negocio Y así seguir satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes   y así poder salir adelante. A la vez  Reyna y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos  con Kiva  por el préstamo otorgado  y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. Reyna esta parada  Se le distingue por su polo manga corta de color aguamarina lleva una hoja sobre la mano, Se despide  Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
Reyna is 51 years old, lives with her partner, and has one son. Reyna has a small business where she has sold clothing for men and women for the past 24 years. Reyna also makes clothing. She has built loyalty with her customers, which has provided income to cover household expenses. Reyna moves forward every day with the help of her family, which strengthens her and allows her to meet her goals.

With the loan, she will invest in more products (fabric, thread, etc.) for her business so that she can continue meeting her customers' needs and moving forward.

Reyna and all of the group members are very grateful to Kiva for the support that they have provided and the confidence that they have shown. Reyna is the woman standing and wearing the aquamarine blue short-sleeved shirt. She has a paper in her hand. She promises to meet all of the proposed goals.

loans.use: to purchase fabric.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo, ha tenido un impacto muy positivo con el préstamo anterior, pues tiene una mayor productividad de granos básicos, sus ingresos no han variado mucho pero si logra dar a su familia un nivel de vida mucho más confortable y cumplir con el pago de sus deudas.
Se ha decidió a solicitar un nuevo préstamo para comprar abono, herbicidas, plaguicidas y semilla, estos materiales son importantes para la preparación de la tierra en la que cultiva granos básicos y para proteger el cultivo de plagas.
texts.en:
The previous loan had a very positive impact on Ricardo because his work yielded more staple grains. His income did not vary much, but he was able to give his family a much more comfortable life and pay off his debts.

He has decided to request a new loan to purchase manure, herbicide, pesticide, and seeds, which are important to prepare the land on which he grows staple grains and protect the crops from pests.

loans.use: to purchase manure, herbicides, pesticides, and seeds, which are important to prepare the land where he grows staple grains.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
El medio ambiente forma parte importante en el planeta y es bueno saber que aun hay personas que se dedican a cuidar el medio ambiente como un actividad productivo tal es el caso de Teresa que desde muy pequeña a tenido ese deseo de plantar en su comunidad, ella tiene 29 años de edad  y tiene le privilegio de tener 2 hijos el primero es de 13 años de edad es estudiante en su comunidad, el segundo de 10 años de edad también estudiante los hijos de ella se ha convertido el motivo principal para seguir adelante en la vida y alcanzar sus sueños.

La actividad que ha venido realizando desde hace 9 años es la plantación de café, ella lo aprendió de sus padres ya que es la única herencia que ellos le dejaron y es por ello que ella se a dedicado de la plantación de los mismos para poder tener un ingreso económico para su familia e obtener ganancias para el sustento de su familia.

El propósito de la realización del préstamo es para la compra de fertilizante químico y orgánico para poder mantener las producciones de café ya que para ella es de mucha importancia que sus plantaciones de café estén en buenas condiciones para que produzcan café de primera calidad.

Ella quiere ser diferente que sus padres y uno de sus más grandes aspiraciones por el futuro es la compra de terreno para dejárselos a sus hijos para que vivan en condiciones adecuadas y seguir brindándoles educación para que sean mejores en un futuro.
texts.en:
The environment is an important part of the planet so it is good to know that there are still dedicated people who care for it. Such is the case of Teresa who since she was a child has wished to grow things in her community. She is 29 years old and feels lucky to have two children. The oldest is 13 and attends the local school. The second one is 10 and is also a student. They are the main reason why Teresa wishes to get ahead and achieve her dreams.

For the last nine years she has earned her living growing coffee, a skill she learned from her parents. This is the only inheritance they left for her. She has planted coffee on the land they left in order to have an income with which to support her family.

Teresa would like a loan to buy chemical and organic fertiliser to put on the coffee plants as it is very important to her that they are in good condition and produce good-quality coffee beans.

She wishes to be different from her parents. One of her greatest hopes for the future is the opportunity to buy land to leave to her children so that they can have a decent standard of living. She also wishes to continue providing them with a good education.

loans.use: buy chemical and organic fertiliser

loans.name: Edward

texts.en:
Edward lives in a rural area together with his spouse and his four children of ages 11, 9, 7, and 2. The first three of these go to primary school in the national school. Edward is 32 years old and has very good references in his community, both personal and professional in nature. His community is located in the district of Ntungamo rural western Uganda.

The main occupations of villagers are agriculture, livestock rearing and trade.

Edward works in agriculture, particularly in the cultivation of bananas and other food crops, and has 10 years of experience in this field. He will use the loan that will be granted to him to buy organic fertilizers and to employ farmhands for his harvest. In this way the loan will help him to improve his crops in terms of their productivity, and also ensure a plentiful harvest. In the end, he will have a greater production, a better quality of his products, and no problems in selling his products.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the university installments for this semester.

loans.name: Retamas De Huayrapata Group

texts.es:
